howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step0: Automatically connect to zero-knowledge proof PoW node as beneficiary

termination.cooldownInfo: After initiating termination, there is a 1-day cooldown period
termination.autoTerminationInfo: After the cooldown period, you can confirm termination, or wait 30 days for automatic termination
termination.terminationWarning: After terminating the node, you will no longer receive new production and rewards.
termination.cooldownCancel: Termination can be cancelled during the cooldown period
termination.withdrawAfterTermination: After termination, you can withdraw unlocked $E
termination.autoTerminatedDescription: Node has been auto-terminated, you can withdraw unlocked $E

whitelist.enterInviteCode: Please enter an invite code to join the whitelist
